thread.title: Democratic lawmaker calls Trump cabinet 'scumbags' | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Democratic lawmaker calls Trump cabinet 'scumbags' | Daily Mail Online

author: Geoff Earle
title: Democratic lawmaker calls Trump cabinet 'scumbags' | Daily Mail Online
text: Now Democratic congresswoman attacks Trump cabinet as 'bunch of scumbags' Representative Maxine Watters has gone after President Trump's cabinet members and associates who had Russia dealings She told MSNBC they were a 'bunch of scumbags' 'All In' host Chris Hayes asked if she meant Secretary of State Tillerson, who did deals in Russia, and she responded that 'Tillerson is there to get these sanctions lifted' Waters mentioned a 'huge deal' to lift Russia sanctions and take over former Soviet republics She also mistakenly referred to chief of staff 'Mike' Priebus She recently referred to Korea when she meant to say Crimea while predicting Trump was 'leading himself' toward impeachment Published: 17:50 GMT, 22 February 2017 | Updated: 02:41 GMT, 23 February 2017 419 shares
